name: Food Truck Chef - Real Prizes
description:
Love sandwiches? Love cooking games? Then you’re at the right counter. Beat the timer and earn real cash prizes along with tons of tips from your customers.

Welcome to Food Truck Chef – Real Prizes. Join top chef Emily who’s a die-hard Sandwich fan and help her serve delicious Sandwiches as you compete with chefs from around the world in real-time!

Yummy features of Food Truck Chef – Real Prizes:

Serve and Manage: Time management is the most critical aspect for a chef, especially when you have a pile of orders from teeming customers who’ve heard about your fabulous sandwiches, and now want to test and taste them.

Beat the Timer, Win Boosters: Every time you manage to serve a certain number of customers within the time limit, you’re rewarded with Boosters.

Patience Meter: It helps you to gauge your customers' moods; how cool is that! If you end up serving while the customer is in a happy mood, you earn bigger tips.

Count your Tips: You get to see exactly how much your customers have tipped you! Woohoo!

Play with Real People: Connect with top chefs from around the world as you dish out the delish.

Win Real Cash Prizes with safe and easy payouts.

Don’t miss the bus, erm Food Truck. Join the Kitchen scramble where you Bake it, Cook it, Serve it at Flo & Emily’s Restaurant Games - a delicious diner serving hot and cold sandwiches on the wheels.
